author: VinInn
body:
upgrade RecoTrackSelector to allow BTV-like cuts
in particular add cut on pixel hits, number of hits (not layers), tip/lip wrt PV
I renamed previous cuts on number of Layers to clearly point out that are layers (regression, in principle should not be silent failure though)
modified default config, do not exclude that "private" config will break
title: upgrade RecoTrackSelector to allow BTV-like cuts
